md:
giải nghĩa từ "caster" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Caster (noun)
	* Meaning: A person who casts a spell or performs magic.
	* Vietnamese: Người dùng phép thuật.
	* Example sentence: The caster of the spell was a powerful wizard.
	* Related words: magic, spell, wizard.

2. Caster (noun)
	* Meaning: A device that casts or throws something, such as a fishing rod or a catapult.
	* Vietnamese: Thiết bị phóng.
	* Example sentence: The caster on the fishing rod was broken.
	* Related words: fishing, rod, catapult.

3. Caster (noun)
	* Meaning: A wheel or a set of wheels that can be rotated to change direction, often used on furniture or equipment.
	* Vietnamese: Bánh xe quay.
	* Example sentence: The caster on the office chair was stuck.
	* Related words: wheel, furniture, equipment.

4. Caster (noun)
	* Meaning: A person who selects or assigns actors to roles in a movie, play, or other performance.
	* Vietnamese: Người chọn vai.
	* Example sentence: The caster for the movie was very experienced.
	* Related words: actor, role, movie.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "caster" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Caster (noun)

    • Meaning: A person who casts a spell or performs magic.
    • Vietnamese: Người dùng phép thuật.
    • Example sentence: The caster of the spell was a powerful wizard.
    • Related words: magic, spell, wizard.

  2. Caster (noun)

    • Meaning: A device that casts or throws something, such as a fishing rod or a catapult.
    • Vietnamese: Thiết bị phóng.
    • Example sentence: The caster on the fishing rod was broken.
    • Related words: fishing, rod, catapult.

  3. Caster (noun)

    • Meaning: A wheel or a set of wheels that can be rotated to change direction, often used on furniture or equipment.
    • Vietnamese: Bánh xe quay.
    • Example sentence: The caster on the office chair was stuck.
    • Related words: wheel, furniture, equipment.

  4. Caster (noun)

    • Meaning: A person who selects or assigns actors to roles in a movie, play, or other performance.
    • Vietnamese: Người chọn vai.
    • Example sentence: The caster for the movie was very experienced.
    • Related words: actor, role, movie.
